data.title: Felix Hoffmann, Basketball Player, Stats, Height, Age
data.meta_description: All the stats of Felix Hoffmann during his basketball career. And information about his date of birth, age, height, games, teams, teammates, shoots...
data.text:
Felix Hoffmann scores a career high 25 points (2009)

On March 28, 2009, Felix Hoffmann set his career high in points in a Germany - Pro B game. That day he scored 25 points in TSV Troster's home loss against Crailsheim, 72-87. He also had 5 rebounds, 2 steals. He shot 5/6 from two, 4/7 from three, shooting at 69.2% from the field. He also shot 3/7 from the free-throw line.

Felix Hoffmann grabs a career high 12 rebounds (2011)

On February 19, 2011, Felix Hoffmann set his career high in rebounds in a Germany - Pro B South game. That day he grabbed 12 rebounds in TSV Troster's road win against OeTTINGER Rockets Gotha, 87-98. He also had 13 points.

Felix Hoffmann gives a career high 4 assists (2010)

On January 10, 2010, Felix Hoffmann tied his career high in assists in a Germany - Pro B game. That day he dished 4 assists in TSV Troster's home win against Herzoege Wolfenbuettel, 85-76. He also had 8 points, 6 rebounds.

Felix Hoffmann has a career high 5 steals (2010)

On March 27, 2010, Felix Hoffmann set his career high in steals in a Germany - Pro B game. That day he reached 5 steals in TSV Troster's home win against Frankfurt, 74-64. He also had 9 points, 5 rebounds and 4 assists.

Felix Hoffmann blocks a career high 1 shot (2009)

On November 22, 2009, Felix Hoffmann tied his career high in blocks in a Germany - Pro B game. That day he went for 1 block in TSV Troster's road win against WÃ¼rzburg, 62-66. He also had 1 point, 7 rebounds.
